verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Rock of Ages, cleft for me, newline Let me hide myself in Thee. newline Let the water and the blood, newline From Thy wounded side which flowed, newline Be of sin the double cure, newline Save from wrath and make me pure.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Nothing in my hand I bring, newline Simply to Thy cross I cling; newline Naked come to Thee for dress, newline Helpless look to Thee for grace; newline Foul I to the fountain fly, newline Wash me Savior or I die.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Not the labor of my hands, newline Can fulfill Thy law's demands; newline Could my zeal no respite know, newline Could my tears forever flow, newline All for sin could not atone; newline Thou must save and Thou alone.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: While I draw this fleeting breath, newline When my eyes shall close in death, newline When I rise to worlds unknown, newline And behold Thee on Thy throne, newline Rock of Ages cleft for me, newline Let me hide myself in Thee.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Could my tears forever flow? newline Could my zeal no languor know? newline These for sin could not atone; newline Thou must save, and Thou alone. newline In my hand no price I bring; newline Simply to thy cross I cling.
